"Xiera": "Weak Bullet is generally considered an important skill to be used against enemy bosses."
"However, keep in mind that only <red>one weak bullet may be placed on each enemy at a time<c>. Pay attention to your placement!"
"Not all enemy spots have the same defense. Try to place your weak bullet on weak spots for maximum effectiveness."
"Let's go over launchers and [Over the Shoulder View] next!"
